pkgmetadata.longdescription: # HUVR ClientA Python client (with examples) to connect to HUVRdata.You must be an active customer of HUVRdata.com for this library to be useful.The client is a thin wrapper around the Python `requests` library. It is provided asa convenience to help customers access their data.## API DocsThe API docs are available at [docs.huvrdata.app](https://docs.huvrdata.app).<!-- TODO --><!-- ## Installation --><!-- ## Usage -->
